title: Global Air Cargo Security and Screening Systems Market Report 2015 - Air Cargo Security Threats a Major Market Driver
text:
Research and Markets
DUBLIN , Oct. 23, Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/7l38jj/global_air_cargo ) has announced the addition of the "Global Air Cargo Security and Screening Systems Market 2015-2019" report to their offering.
The report forecasts the global air cargo security and screening systems market to grow at a CAGR of 5.15% over the period 2014-2019.
The report, Global Air Cargo Security and Screening Systems Market 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report discusses the major drivers influencing market growth, outlines the challenges faced by vendors and the market as a whole, as well as the key trendss emerging in the market.
Dedicated freight operators and freighter aircrafts provide air cargo trade with more specialized offerings. Furthermore, to handle the growing global air cargo trade volume, there also has been an increase in development of dedicated air cargo terminals. To meet the international security standards, and to handle the air cargo security screening process efficiently, such dedicated cargo terminals establish screening facilities equipped with advanced cargo screening systems.
According to the report, the air cargo industry is vulnerable to terror attacks, and there is an increased need for air cargo security and screening systems. For example, in 2010, two packages shipped from Yemen to Chicago were discovered to contain explosive materials. Also, in 2013, terrorist attacks increased by 43% worldwide. Therefore, the air cargo requires efficient and advanced cargo screening systems to handle the increasing volume, and provide enhanced security measures.
Further, the report states that high cost of technology is a major challenge faced by the market.
